reviewText: I am Italian and while I like the concept, the voiceover is clearly made by somebody who has never learned the language well. I don't want my kid to be confused because in the family we pronounce the same words correctly. The stress and accent and the vowels are all a little funky. I guess if you want your kid to speak the equivalent of an obscure ancient dialect you will be fine.

Little Pim is a great dvd! I wish the dvds would speak English and Italian because some things might not be obvious to the child as to what it is, however it is written in english so a parent can watch along and say the English word/phrase.
